mapper.select: select bar.id, role_name, description, bar.created_at, is_active, is_deleted, bar.update_at from base_forge.public.bf_auth_role bar left join base_forge.public.bf_auth_user_role baur on bar.id = baur.role_id and bar.is_deleted = false and bar.is_active = true where baur.user_auth_id = #{userAuthId}
